comments.body: not idempotent; if `new_name` specified, check for existence of qtree again with `new_name` before determining it needs to be created; if exists with new_name, return `changed: false`
We're expecting the rename command to fail if the qtree with new_name already exists.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +204,208 @@                changed = True
            else:  # rename
                if self.new_name and self.name != self.new_name:
                    changed = True
                    rename_qtree = True
